name: Ye Fenny - Revenge of the Evil Good Shepherd
description: A top-down action adventure shooter, with a progressive story told through 90’s style cutscenes. Crisp graphics, crazy enemies, insane boss battles & that all-important 90’s style sound track to keep you pumped!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Xp Processor: Pentium 4 HT 3.0Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: HD4650 1GB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Direct X 9 Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Dual Core Processor Intel or AMD 1.6Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 6000 Series Nvidia / HD6000 Series AMD DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Direct X 9 Compatible
